## Conversion.GenericDefaultingConverter.convert() method

Converts from `unknown` to `<T>`<!-- -->. For objects and arrays, is guaranteed to return a new entity, with any unrecognized properties removed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
convert(from: unknown, ctx?: TC | undefined): Success<T | TD>;
```

**Returns:**

[Success](./ts-utils.success.md)<!-- -->&lt;T \| TD&gt;

A [Result](./ts-utils.result.md) with a [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) and a value on success or an [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) with a a message on failure.
